about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

You go to a library and you're doing a college research paper on fairy tales,
When you open the Little Red Riding Hood fairy tale book, you find that you have entered this fairy tale world.
But this fairy tale seems to be different from the original one.
What will happen there?

Characters

Red Riding Hood:

The familiar Little Red Riding Hood, the one being chased by the Big Bad Wolf.
But here she has a curvy body and plump figure,
She is asking you for help.

Cinderella:

The Cinderella who was once bullied is no longer the weak Cinderella.
What will she guide you to do if she becomes so proactive?

Sleeping Beauty:

Sleeping Beauty, trapped in a sleep curse, is waiting for someone to help her break the curse.
And the way to break the curse is "love".

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
